Are you sure you want to perform the act: Are you sure you want to perform the action?
about us description: Laboratorio de IDEas is a research and community outreach project of the IDE School of Government - Los Hemisferios University. The objective is to facilitate decision-making about cities, through the consolidation and analysis of public data generated by the institutions. Our work is innovative, collaborative and citizen focused.
about us description complement: We work with all Ecuadorian intermediate cities that have between 100,000 and 500,000 urban inhabitants or those that are smaller but are provincial capitals. In our first stage, we piloted with Portoviejo, Manta, Riobamba, Ambato and El Coca.
about us help: We have the support of Counterpart International.
about us contact: If you want us to consider your data or report on the portal, contact us.
index description: Know the performance of your city in the subject of your interest and compare with other similar cities.
citizen reports description: We transform data into knowledge through analytical reports from each city or a set of cities.
our_cities_description: Select a city to view data and statistics
compare_cities: Compare the development of two cities
response_covid_description: Data and statistics from covid-19 in the medium-sized cities of Ecuador
title-about-us: Laboratory of Urban IDEas is a research and action project of the IDE School of Government- Universidad de Los Hemisferios.
evolution_covid_ecuador: Evolution of COVID-19 in the cities of Ecuador
cities_pandemic: How the Cities Act in the Face of the Pandemic
difine_compare_description: Choose an intermediate city, define it in your own words and see how many people think like you.
define_compare_footer: *Cities with a population between 100,000 and 500,000 urban inhabitants, or that have fewer and are provincial capitals.
